Religious education also plays a role, with 58.9% of parents favoring it as a reason for homeschooling.

clusters.title: Satisfaction Levels
clusters.description: Parental satisfaction varies significantly across different types of schooling. Private school parents report the highest satisfaction levels, with 96% expressing high satisfaction. Homeschooling parents also show strong satisfaction, with 85% reporting high levels. In contrast, district school parents have the lowest satisfaction, with only 39% very satisfied. These insights highlight the varying degrees of contentment among parents depending on the schooling type.
